def_cn: (作动词 be 的主语，表示存在与否或引起注意)
def_en: There is used as the subject of the verb 'be' to say that something exists or does not exist, or to draw attention to it.

def_cn: (用在某些动词前表示某事物存在、发展或可见，动词的单复数取决于其后的名词)
def_en: You use there in front of certain verbs when you are saying that something exists, develops, or can be seen. Whether the verb is singular or plural depends on the noun which follows the verb.

def_cn: (用于 hello 或 hi 之后作为问候语)
def_en: There is used after 'hello' or 'hi' when you are greeting someone.

def_cn: 存在地;现有地;可得到地
def_en: If something is there, it exists or is available.

def_cn: 那儿(指已经提及的地方)
def_en: You use there to refer to a place which has already been mentioned.

def_cn: 那儿，那边(表示用手指向的或目视的地方)
def_en: You use there to indicate a place that you are pointing to or looking at, in order to draw someone's attention to it.

def_cn: (用于 there he was 或 there we were 等表达方式中，用以概括故事或为了制造特殊效果放慢故事的节奏)
def_en: You use there in expressions such as 'there he was' or 'there we were' to sum up part of a story or to slow a story down for dramatic effect.

def_cn: …在吗(电话用语)
def_en: You use there when speaking on the telephone to ask if someone is available to speak to you.

def_cn: 在那一点上(指别人谈话中的某个观点)
def_en: You use there to refer to a point that someone has made in a conversation.

def_cn: 那里，那儿(指活动、过程已经达到的阶段)
def_en: You use there to refer to a stage that has been reached in an activity or process.

def_cn: (表示取得圆满成功)
def_en: You use there to indicate that something has reached a point or level which is completely successful.

def_cn: 别无他法;无计可施;只能这样了
def_en: You can use there in expressions such as there you go or there we are when accepting that an unsatisfactory situation cannot be changed.

def_cn: 我讲的没错吧;我说对了吧
def_en: You can use there in expressions such as there you go and there we are when emphasizing that something proves that you were right.

def_cn: 话说回来;再说了;不过
def_en: You use there again to introduce an extra piece of information which either contradicts what has been said or gives an alternative to it.

def_cn: 又来了;又来这套
def_en: Phrases such as there you go again are used to show annoyance at someone who is repeating something that has annoyed you in the past.

def_cn: 就这样定了;别说了
def_en: You can add 'so there' to what you are saying to show that you will not change your mind about a decision you have made, even though the person you are talking to disagrees with you.

def_cn: 立即;立刻
def_en: If something happens there and then or then and there, it happens immediately.

def_cn: 好了，好了(用于安慰他人，尤其是儿童)
def_en: You say 'there there' to someone who is very upset, especially a small child, in order to comfort them.

def_cn: 给你;拿去吧
def_en: You say 'there you are' or 'there you go' when you are offering something to someone.

def_cn: (尤指困难时)帮助，支持
def_en: If someone is there for you, they help and support you, especially when you have problems.
